events.text: Jesus ascends and promises the Spirit
The Spirit is poured out at Pentecost
The church in Jerusalem grows rapidly
Philip and others preach in Samaria and beyond
Saul is converted and begins to preach Christ
The gospel reaches Gentiles like Cornelius
The council at Jerusalem affirms salvation by grace
Paul undertakes missionary journeys through the empire
Paul returns to Jerusalem and is arrested
Paul appeals to Caesar and sails to Rome
Paul preaches the kingdom of God in Rome
